resources.string: indicates that the app has been moved to external storage
indicates that the app has not been moved to external storage, but can be
indicates that the developer has been prevented the app from being moved to external storage
indicates that the app prefers being on external storage, and is there
indicates that the app prefers being on external storage, but is installed to internal storage anyway

Thanks to iSec Partners for providing the source code to Manifest Explorer, which pointed me in the right direction in parsing the AndroidManifest file. Thanks to the guys at QuickSystemInfo for providing their source code, which showed me how to directly open the Application Info program.
